The diagram depicts the steps in the summarization process.

Step 1
List the IP addresses you want to summarize.

172.20.0.010101100.00010100.00000000.00000000
172.21.0.010101100.00010101.00000000.00000000
172.22.0.010101100.00010110.00000000.00000000
172.23.0.010101100.00010111.00000000.00000000

Step 2
The first 14 bits of each of these addresses are the same. The number of matching bits equals 14.

Step 3
Copy the matching bits and add zero bits to determine the network address.
